content.content: Tool House Rock #1 | Omnistrat      Please join us on Tuesday 7-Feb for the first session of Tool House Rock! For the inaugural episode, we will host the founder from Omnistrat to explore this project’s collaboration solution for managing a DAO’s strategic plan.  What is Tool House Rock? Tool House Rock is a structured community call to give projects a way to showcase their tools and solutions to the growing MakerDAO Ecosystem. Tool House Rock will follow a consistent presentation agenda, focused on giving Ecosystem Actors a foundation for reviewing and assessing tools against.  What is Omnistrat? Omnistrat  is collaboration and coordination software that enables cross-functional teams to plan, create, and manage projects with unmatched coordination. Omnistrat’s features are purpose built to support decentralized operations for DAOs Governance, coordination, and operations (focused on):  Strategic Planning Member Onboarding Organized Persistent Chat Project Management Task Management Best Practice Playbook Marketplace.   Our guest is…   Omnistrat  Founder - Matt Johnson @OmnistratMatt    Slide Deck available here.  Session hosted by…  @Retro @Juan   Join Us! If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guest on this post, and our hosts will ask them during the Q&A.  Agenda:  Introduction of the problem space Product solution Demonstration Relevancy with Endgame Q&A   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2023-02-07T16:00:00Z  Add the call to your calendar.  Where Zoom Link  here   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Attn: @Core-Facilitators, @Recognized-Delegates

Hi! I’m the founder of Omnistrat. It was a pleasure presenting to MakerDAO at today’s Tool House Rock session. A lot of good questions were asked and hopefully I answered them satisfactorily. Omnistrat brings plan-based governance to DAO operations. We believe it is a better model for tapping the wizdom of the community, building stronger plans with broader consensus, and fostering better coordination. It also contributes to the universal coordination toolkit (UCT) Rune envisioned in his Endgame Plan. The video of the presentation and project demo will be posted to Youtube. The presentation used is already linked in the original post above. Please check it out and get in touch with me if you want to pilot Omnistrat in your core unit or future MetaDAO!
Here is a link to a quick demo video of Omnistrat’s functionality. Consider this the tl;dr version of the presentation I did for MakerDAO’s Tool House Rock above.
